title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: In build 2002071610021, when deleting items from the Coolbar, the layout is corrupted.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of the second row remaining, it is also removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain as it is.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted. Note that the second row is also removed, which is incorrect.
4. Expected behavior: The second row should remain even after the delete occurs.
